column1: '''Cecilia Barella''' is a member of the [[Italian Tolkien Society]]. Barella is also the editor of ''A Tolkien Webliography''
column2: a blog that tries to document Tolkien's texts on the net. As of July 2010
column4: the work on the blog seems to be abandoned (no update since January 2008).
